title: Projects
text:
NBA Win Odds Model

Goal: Predict NBA game outcomes using machine learning models on the 2023-2024 season dataset.
Dataset: Team stats (points, rebounds, assists, past performance, home-court advantage).
Models Used: Logistic Regression, Random Forest, XGBoost.
Best Model: Logistic Regression with PCA (68.55% accuracy).

Findings: - Feature selection and PCA improved performance. - Logistic regression outperformed tree-based models due to dataset size and interpretability. - XGBoost struggled with overfitting (67.39% accuracy). - Future Work: Expand dataset, add more predictive factors.
View on GitHub


Superhost Prediction Model

Developed a machine learning model to predict if an Airbnb listing qualifies as a Superhost.

Utilized Python and data manipulation libraries like Pandas, NumPy, and etc. to analyze data and produce ML models.

View on GitHub



NurseMatch Recommendation System

Designed and implemented a deep learning-based recommendation system to match nurses with hospitals, achieving 84% prediction accuracy for job satisfaction and placements.
Utilized Python and libraries such as TensorFlow, Keras, NumPy, and Pandas to build and optimize the model.
Combined nurse preferences and hospital ratings using a Deep NeuralNetwork to predict user satisfaction probabilities.

View on GitHub
